channel.title: Ivory Towers
channel.description: Ivory Towers are a '..willful disconnect from the everyday world; esoteric, over-specialized, or even useless research, and academic elitism.'

item.title: Welcome to The Ivory Towers!
item.description:
This first revelation will not really reveal that much - it is more like a period indicating that something new is coming!

But what is Ivory Towers really?

First of, Ivory Towers is what the acronym IT stands for - and to detail this somewhat please consider this Wikipedia article on Ivory Tower!

Seriously?!

Allright, sleeves up, tie off -

IT is the fabric that ties modern organisations together and helps them excel at what their ambitions are. IT is massive and firm at the foundation and has a sharp pointed tip.

Oh - and by the way

The API documentation and user manuals for Ivory Towers are made with the fabulous Jekyll docs software.
